classes.description: Override or extend the styles applied to the component.See CSS classes API below for more details.
classes.description_zh: 覆盖或扩展应用于组件的样式。有关详细信息，请参阅下面的 CSS 类 API。

disabled.description: If true, the component is disabled.
disabled.description_zh: 如果为 true，则禁用该组件。

loading.description: If true, the loading indicator is shown and the button becomes disabled.
loading.description_zh: 如果为 true，则显示加载指示器，并且按钮变为禁用。

loadingIndicator.description: Element placed before the children if the button is in loading state. The node should contain an element with role="progressbar" with an accessible name. By default we render a CircularProgress that is labelled by the button itself.
loadingIndicator.description_zh: 如果按钮处于加载状态，则放置在子项之前的元素。该节点应包含具有 role=“progressbar” 的元素，该元素具有可访问的名称。默认情况下，我们呈现一个由按钮本身标记的 CircularProgress。

loadingPosition.description: The loading indicator can be positioned on the start, end, or the center of the button.
loadingPosition.description_zh: 加载指示器可以位于按钮的开始、结束或中心。

sx.description: The system prop that allows defining system overrides as well as additional CSS styles.See the `sx` page for more details.
sx.description_zh: 允许定义系统覆盖以及其他 CSS 样式的系统属性。有关更多详细信息，请参阅“sx”页面。
